channel.title: Webclient - Jarred file fail [Will Rep+]
channel.description:
I am currently working on a webclient. When I go to the not-jarred file and open the run.bat file it works perfect and doesn't give any errors. When I jar it and open it then it's downloading the cache, unpacking the cache, sets the background but then it says (after "Connecting to update server"):
[code]loaderror Connection to update server 60[/code]
After that message popped up the screen where the cache loads says:
[code] Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape
To fix this try the following (in order):
1: Remove any recently added media files from the client 2: Re-Extract your clients source and use it to connect 3: Make sure you have and are using Java V1_0_5 or better 4: Try rebooting your computer 5: Send an Email to Tornsouls@ymail.com for assistance [/code]
Does anyone know how to fix this? [Will Rep+]

item.title: Webclient - Jarred file fail [Will Rep+]
item.dc:creator: @Obby2lumb Obby2lumb
item.description:
@Obby2lumb wrote:

I am currently working on a webclient. When I go to the not-jarred file and open the run.bat file it works perfect and doesn’t give any errors. When I jar it and open it then it’s downloading the cache, unpacking the cache, sets the background but then it says (after “Connecting to update server”):

After that message popped up the screen where the cache loads says:

Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading RuneScape

To fix this try the following (in order):

1: Remove any recently added media files from the client
2: Re-Extract your clients source and use it to connect
3: Make sure you have and are using Java V1_0_5 or better
4: Try rebooting your computer
5: Send an Email to Tornsouls@ymail.com for assistance

Does anyone know how to fix this? [Will Rep+]
